Usage:                 <working-directory>    <libraries>    <scan>                      
Description:                                                                             
                                                                                         
<working-directory>    Location of path where it'll store its database and other info    
<libraries>            Locations of Directories to store files                           
<scan>                 List of Directories to scan for Document files                    
--https-port           TCP port on which to listen for incoming HTTP connections         
--daemon               Run as daemon                                                     
--quiet                Run Quietly                                                       
--out-dir              Location of the output directory                                  
--undocumented
